thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Exchanges’ Fees and Rebates Could Get a Cut

author: Dave Michaels
title: Exchanges’ Fees and Rebates Could Get a Cut
text:
WASHINGTON—A system of fees and rebates that promotes trading in stocks would be reduced under a pilot program proposed by regulators on Wednesday.
Critics of the system, known as “maker taker,” say it can distort brokers’ decisions about where to send orders and attracts high-speed traders whose strategies sometimes focus on capturing rebates.
The...
